name: Hero Survivors
description:
Many monsters and enemies approach the hero in castle and tower. You need to defeat them, If you are strong enough, you can idle play and get treasures and save hostages.
You can play everywhere ,every time. It is a boring killer game.

HOW TO PLAY:
1 - Kill all enemies
2 - Get more skill
3 - Increase your power
4 - get more money

Collect all treasures and become the best hero in Hero Survivors.

If you love the game. Give us your feedback: https://www.facebook.com/tutappgames

Enjoy your time.
